data.message: How can I delete account permanently, I have been at the top of the page and looked at facebook tools, but I could not find the delete button. Can youTell me exactly how I can find the delete account permanently button, because I want to delete facebook account forever.

replies.message: We’re sorry to see you go, Mohammad. If you don't think you'll use Facebook again, you can request to have your account permanently deleted. Please keep in mind that you won't be able to reactivate your account or retrieve anything you've added. Learn more at: https://www.facebook.com/help/224562897555674 -Chantal
I am trying to go in https://www.facebook.com/help/224562897555674 -Chantal but still my account is not permanent deleted, why?
